dialogue: Yo yo yo, how's my main man?
At work, Quinn. At my job. Where I am not allowed to take personal calls.
I mean, does this count as personal?
Unless it has to do with the distribution of lactose-free milk throughout the tri-county area: yes. Yes, this counts as personal.
Yeah, I didn't take this job for the thrills.
Then why did you take it?
Well, because...Quinn, I can't really talk about this right now.
Yet somehow I don't think my boss will see it that way.
Okay, great! I'll call back later to hear what he said.
No! Fucking hell man, please stop call-...
I hang up. Hopefully his boss appreciates the importance of friendship.
